text: Is anyone able to help out? Also please let me know whether my question is unclear / posted in the wrong channel!

Depends on what the association is I suppose. You would need to know what object relates to it and why, which most the time requires a human touch. However, if just connecting contacts to companies, HubSpot has an option where when a contact with an email that has the same domain as a company record, it links it to that company.

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/crm-setup/automatically-create-and-associate-companies-with-contacts#:~:text=Enable%20automatic%20association%20between%20contacts,to%20CRM%20%3E%20Contacts%20%26%20companies>.
